products.title: Ashville Grey Weave Roman Blind
products.description: If you love their bordered roman blinds then youre sure to love the ones from tuiss even more. They have the added luxury of the bordered fabric on three sides rather than two. products.title: Carmen Silver
products.description: Min width: 300mm max width: 1350mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 100% polyester guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. products.title: Delicious Grey (6510)
